name.zh: 极简日常双肩包（多颜色）

description.en: A clean minimalist backpack designed for everyday carry. Features a roomy main compartment, front zip pocket, and side bottle pocket. The simple silhouette works for school and commuting. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pockets, zippers & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 极简风日常双肩包，适合通勤与上学。主仓容量充足，前置拉链袋便于快取，侧边水杯袋实用。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Padding: Foam/EVA padding for straps & back panel (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
五金：金属/塑料扣具（可定制）
背负：肩带/背部可加海绵/EVA 衬垫（可定制）

en.Compartments: 1 main compartment + front zip pocket + internal sleeve (optional) + side bottle pocket
en.Customization: Colors, fabric, logo, lining, pocket layout, zipper & hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 1 主仓 + 前拉链袋 + 内部夹层（可选）+ 侧边水杯袋
zh.可定制: 配色、面料、Logo、内里、口袋结构、拉链五金、包装
